Also known as a whaleboat, the launch is a large, open dinghy with a stout, round-bottomed hull that can stand Pinnace up to surprisingly rough seas. Launches are often carried The pinnace is a small, two-masted sailing vessel. It’s sturdy by larger ships for use in landing in places where the larger enough to undertake long open-water voyages and handy ship can’t go. enough to use close to shore. A pinnace is fully decked, A launch is too small to have different hull sections, but its sterncastle is hardly worthy of the name; it’s little and therefore only has an overall AC and a single hp total more than a cramped cabin. for the hull. description: An amphibious medusa has a +8 racial bonus on Special Qualities: Darkvision 90 ft. , landwalking, light any Swim check to perform some special action or avoid a blindness, speak with eels, vulnerability to fire hazard. It can always choose to take 10 on a Swim check, Saves: Fort +5, Ref +3, Will +3 even if distracted or endangered. It can use the run action Abilities: Str 15, Dex 14, Con 15, Int 10, Wis 14, Cha 6 while swimming, provided it swims in a straight line. Skills: Hide +10 (+14 in coral, rock, or kelp), Listen +2, Spot +10, Survival +6, Swim +10
